overview.title: Fencing for Large Properties
overview.content: Ranch and farm properties need fencing that's practical, durable, and cost-effective over large areas. We specialize in post-and-rail, split rail, and board fencing for properties from 1 acre to 100+ acres.
overview.additionalContent: Whether you need horse-safe fencing, cattle containment, or simply a beautiful boundary for your rural estate, we have the expertise and materials to get it done right.
features: Post & rail, split rail, board fence options

styles.name: Post & Rail (2-Rail)

faqs.question: What's the best fence for horses?
faqs.answer: For horses, we recommend 3-rail post and rail with rounded top rail or board fencing. Avoid wire mesh alone as horses can catch legs. We can add a sight board at top for better visibility.

faqs.question: How do you price large property fencing?
faqs.answer: Large property fencing is priced per linear foot. We offer volume discounts for properties over 1 acre. Split rail is most affordable, followed by post-and-rail, then board fence.

faqs.question: Can you add gates for equipment?
faqs.answer: Yes, we install single, double, and wide farm gates for tractors, trucks, and equipment. Gate widths up to 20 feet available with proper bracing.

faqs.question: What wood lasts longest for ranch fencing?
faqs.answer: Black locust is the longest-lasting (30-50 years) but most expensive. Cedar lasts 20-30 years and is mid-range. Treated pine is most affordable at 15-20 years.
